version_description:
You asked, we listened. We’ve made updates to help you boost your GPA:

Now access Textbook Solutions you’ve viewed online or in the Chegg Study app from the Textbook Solutions tab
We’ve got more updates coming soon! To make sure you don’t miss them, keep your Updates turned on.

Thanks for choosing Chegg!

We update the app regularly so we can make it better for you.
Get the latest version for all of the available features and improvements.
Thanks for using Chegg!
The Chegg Books app is newly designed to help you save money on textbooks.

You asked, we listened. We’ve made updates to help you boost your GPA:

Now access Textbook Solutions you’ve viewed online or in the Chegg Study app from the Textbook Solutions tab
We’ve got more updates coming soon! To make sure you don’t miss them, keep your Updates turned on.

Thanks for choosing Chegg!

We update the app regularly so we can make it better for you.
Get the latest version for all of the available features and improvements.
Thanks for using Chegg!

We update the app regularly so we can make it better for you.
Get the latest version for all of the available features and improvements.
Thanks for using Chegg!

We are excited to introduce the brand new Chegg eReader! Study on any device for easy access to your eTextbooks whenever you need them most. Highlight and bookmark important pages.
Please send any feedback or questions to Cheggbooks.appsupport@chegg.com

We've made bug fixes to improve your experience.
Have feedback? We'd love to hear from you!
cheggbooks@chegg.com

cheggbooks@chegg.com

We’re working hard to add new features to our eReader. 
This release includes include the ability to quickly and easily take notes directly in your eBook. 
You can also view notes across your devices.
Please send any feedback or questions to cheggbooks@chegg.com

We’re working hard to add new features to our eReader.
This release includes include the ability to quickly and easily take notes directly in your eBook.
You can also view notes across your devices.
Please send any feedback or questions to cheggbooks@chegg.com

We've made bug fixes and additions to improve your experience.
Have feedback? We'd love to hear from you!
cheggbooks@chegg.com

We've improved the reading experience to include landscape mode. In addition, your progress will be synced across devices.
Have feedback? We'd love to hear from you!
cheggbooks@chegg.com

We now provide text-to-speech support in our ePub books so you can listen to your textbooks whenever you want
